scripts.copy: npm run copy:angular && npm run copy:foundation && npm run copy:foundation-icons
scripts.copy:angular: copyfiles -f node_modules/angular/angular.min.js app/vendor && echo Angular Copied
scripts.copy:foundation: npm run copy:foundation:scss && npm run copy:foundation:js && npm run copy:jquery
scripts.copy:foundation:scss: copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/foundation-sites/scss/**/*.scss app/styles/foundation && echo Foundation SCSS Copied
scripts.copy:foundation:js: copyfiles -f node_modules/foundation-sites/dist/js/foundation.min.js app/vendor && echo Foundation JS Copied
scripts.copy:foundation-icons: copyfiles -f node_modules/foundation-icons/foundation-icons.* app/dist/fonts && echo Foundation Icons Copied
scripts.update: npm run copy && echo Update Complete
